phonos-error-category: Pɛga n tari 'phonos rendering' tuure duma
phonos-error-category-desc: Tuure n boni deti ti 'rendering phonos' la.
phonos-audio-conversion-error:
A kakɛ ni mɛ ti a tulege 'audio' le de ŋMp3:
$1
phonos-purge-needed-error-link: 'Refresh' pɛgerɛ la de le malum tirege bisɛ.
phonos-tracking-category-desc: Pɛgerɛ la n tuni se'em [[:me:Extension:Phonos'|phonos]] tukerɛ.
phonos-ipa-too-long: IPA ba'am wɔgɛ mɛ gãna ti a 'render'.
phonos-wikibase-api-error: Ka nyaŋɛ malum yese 'entity' duma la fɔregɛ Wikibase: $1
phonos-wikibase-not-found: Yuuma ka boi dɛna Wikibase item: $1
phonos-empty-file-error: Yuuma la n yese na la dela vɔya. IPA sɛka ti ba dikɛ bɔ' la ta'am dɛna 'invalid, bii la ka suŋeri 'engine' la. Dikera la '$1' 'parameter' ta'am suŋɛ.
phonos-param-error: Dikɛ IPA kɛ'ɛsɛ, faali, bii a Wikibase item nari ti a bɔ.
phonos-unsupported-language-with-suggest: Yetɔgum $1 ka suŋeri 'phonos'. Yetɔgum sebo n doli lɛm wa ta'am suŋera: $2.
phonos-inline-audio-player-mode: Yuuma faali la ma'an, bii Wikibase lɔgerɔ la ba yuuma wi'a ($1) suŋa suŋa, n ta'am bo ti la dɔla yuuma ŋmɛ'a 'mode'.
